plot outline: Chirodini Tumi Je Amar tells the story of a rich, pampered young girl, Pallavi who falls in love with a motor mechanic, Krishna. Pallavi elopes with Krishna and soon they get married. Her uncle comes looking for her and promises to convince everyone of her marriage. Based on a tragic real life love story of Priyanka-Rizwanur angle, witnessing the pain of lovers in this Indian Bengali film.
